alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 11 at 10:17PM MST until December 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 10 AM through 5 PM Sunday for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 221, 222, 226, 227, 228, 229, 230, 233, and 237 which includes Teller, El Paso, Fremont, Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas, and Baca counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221...226 AND 227... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221...226 and 227. * Winds...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
